about.title: About
about.motivationText1: Passionate about technological innovation and software development, I transform complex ideas into intuitive and high-performing applications. Specialized in full-stack development, I design modern user experiences that combine elegance, efficiency, and technical robustness.
about.motivationText2: Every project is an opportunity for me to innovate, learn, and create impactful solutions.

allprojects.title: My Projects
allprojects.description: I have worked on backend, frontend, DevOps, and full-stack projects, integrating business logic, APIs, database management, and modern, responsive user interfaces, allowing me to master the entire web application development cycle.
allprojects.hook: Each project is a new learning experience

Projects-List.sujet: Development of the front-end of a mini web application using Angular. It allows users to create and customize an electronic signature quickly and easily.
Projects-List.skillLearned: This project allowed me to learn how to use a local database server with Angular to test front-end logic. I used json-server (json-server --watch db.json) to simulate an API before integrating an external database system.

Projects-List.sujet: Implementation of a DevOps CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins, GitHub, SonarQube, and Docker. Automation of build, testing, and deployment processes on Ubuntu WSL.
Projects-List.skillLearned: This project helped me set up a complete DevOps CI/CD pipeline with automated testing and deployment.

Projects-List.titre: Football Platform: Training, Tactics, and Analysis
Projects-List.sujet: Full-stack Spring Boot & Angular project developed by a team of 5 members with active collaboration and role distribution. I developed the Tactics and Formations modules on both front-end and back-end sides.
Projects-List.skillLearned: This project allowed me to gain experience in teamwork, integrate front-end with back-end, consume APIs, and develop an AI model for prediction.

Projects-List.sujet: Front-end development of a portfolio website for a graphic designer by transforming Figma mockups into a functional interface. Implementation of a modern, responsive, and user-friendly design.
Projects-List.skillLearned: This project allowed me to convert a Figma design into Angular components, integrate the EmailJS API for email sending, and deploy the website using GitHub and Netlify.

Projects-List.sujet: Backend development of a household management application using Spring Boot. Integration of a MySQL database to manage users, resources, and daily operations.
Projects-List.skillLearned: This project helped me learn SOA architecture, create and test APIs using Postman, and document them using Swagger.

Projects-List.sujet: Full-stack development of a library management web application using Symfony. Integration of a MySQL database to manage books, users, and loans.
Projects-List.skillLearned: This project allowed me to understand and apply monolithic architecture, where front-end and back-end are integrated into a single web application.

Projects-List.titre: Microservices Mini Project with Spring Boot
Projects-List.sujet: Development of a microservices-based mini project using Spring Boot, including an API Gateway, Eureka service discovery, and a centralized configuration server. Secure authentication implemented with Keycloak.
Projects-List.skillLearned: This project allowed me to design and develop a microservices architecture, implement an API Gateway and service discovery with Eureka, and secure the system using Keycloak.

Projects-List.titre: Improvement of Online Complaint Management – Tunisia Telecom
Projects-List.sujet: Full-stack engineering internship project aimed at redesigning and improving the online complaint management system, covering both front-end and back-end. Implementation of enhanced features, UI optimization, and efficient data management.
Projects-List.skillLearned: This project allowed me to use Spring Security to secure application endpoints and implement an email notification system for complaint tracking and management.
